title: Executive Order 12178-Foreign Assistance Functions
content: FUNCTIONS UNDER THE FOREIGN ASSISTANCE ACT OF 1961, AS AMENDED

By the authority vested in me as President of the United States of America by Section 633 of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961, as amended (22 U.S.C. 2393), Executive Order No. 11223 of May 12, 1965, is hereby amended by adding at the end thereof the following Section:

JIMMY CARTER
The White House,
December 10, 1979.
[Filed with the Office of the Federal Register, 11: 15 a.m., December 11, 1979]
citation: Jimmy Carter, Executive Order 12178-Foreign Assistance Functions Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/248142
